column4: Hello. I uninstalled command-not-found but I'm still getting "hints" (eg "No command 'xevt' found, did you mean: <list of possibilities>") - what package is responsible for this?
sudodpkg -P command-not-found (it leaves a configfile behind)
seems there's still some other 'droppings' left over
ah got it. had to purge the -data package too.
